reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed here 2 nights 1st weekend Nov. Easy to find - just off the highway and a short drive to central Emmeloord. Good base for exploring the Flevoland and Friesland.
reviews.title: Good overall experience at Emmeloord

reviews.text: PROs: Quiet location, lots of easy free parking.
reviews.title: Very good hotel and retaurant

reviews.text: Pleasant check in experience with english spoken by almost all employees.
reviews.title: Good comfortable and clean hotel

reviews.text: Lovely reception area with a bar and coffee bar - this was always busy and well used.
reviews.title: Nice room, friendly staff
